00001 #ifndef _HistogramTwoD_hh_

00011 #include <iostream>

00013 namespace histmgr {
00014 
00015 enum EHistogram2DIntType {kHistogram2DXNBins, kHistogram2DYNBins, 
00016                           kHistogram2DId, kNHistogram2DInts};
00017 enum EHistogram2DFloatType {kHistogram2DXmin, kHistogram2DXmax, 
00018                             kHistogram2DYmin, kHistogram2DYmax, 
00019                             kNHistogram2DFloats};
00020 enum EHistogram2DDoubleType {kHistogram2DEntries, kNHistogram2DDoubles};
00021 
00022 class Histogram2D : public lcio::LCGenericObject
00023 {
00024 protected:
00025   Histogram2D(lcio::LCObject* a_obj);
00026   Histogram2D() : _obj(0) , _createdObject( false) {};
00027 
00028 public:
00029   ~Histogram2D() { 
00030       if( _createdObject )  delete _obj ; 
00031   }
00032 
00034   //CRP 5/1/06 To satisfy redefinition of interface in LCIO
00035   virtual int id() const { return _obj->id() ; }
00036 
00037   UInt_t xFirstBinIndex() const {return 1;};
00038   UInt_t xLastBinIndex() const {return xNBins();};
00039   UInt_t yFirstBinIndex() const {return 1;};
00040   UInt_t yLastBinIndex() const {return yNBins();};
00041   UInt_t xUnderflowBinIndex() const {return 0;};
00042   UInt_t xOverflowBinIndex() const {return xNBins()+1;};
00043   UInt_t yUnderflowBinIndex() const {return 0;};
00044   UInt_t yOverflowBinIndex() const {return yNBins()+1;};
00045   
00046   UInt_t xNBins() const {
00047     return (UInt_t)  _obj->getIntVal(kHistogram2DXNBins);
00048   };
00049 
00050   Float_t xMin() const {
00051     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram2DXmin);
00052   }; 
00053 
00054   Float_t xMax() const {
00055     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram2DXmax);
00056   };
00057 
00058   UInt_t yNBins() const {
00059     return (UInt_t)  _obj->getIntVal(kHistogram2DYNBins);
00060   };
00061 
00062   Float_t yMin() const {
00063     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram2DYmin);
00064   }; 
00065 
00066   Float_t yMax() const {
00067     return _obj->getFloatVal(kHistogram2DYmax);
00068   };
00069 
00070 
00071   Float_t xBinCenter(UInt_t bin_index) 
00072   {
00073     Float_t x=xMin() + (bin_index-xFirstBinIndex()+.5) / _xToBin;
00074     return x;
00075   }
00076 
00077   Float_t xBinLowEdge(UInt_t bin_index) 
00078   {
00079     return xMin() + (bin_index - xFirstBinIndex())/_xToBin;
00080   }
00081 
00082   Float_t xBinWidth(UInt_t) 
00083   {
00084     return 1/_xToBin;
00085   }
00086 
00087 
00088   Float_t yBinCenter(UInt_t bin_index) 
00089   {
00090     Float_t y=yMin() + (bin_index-yFirstBinIndex()+.5) / _yToBin;
00091     return y;
00092   }
00093 
00094   Float_t yBinLowEdge(UInt_t bin_index) 
00095   {
00096     //    Float_t y=yMin();
00097     //    Float_t y_step=(yMax() - yMin()) / yNBins();
00098     return yMin() + (bin_index - yFirstBinIndex())/_yToBin;
00099   }
00100 
00101   Float_t yBinWidth(UInt_t) 
00102   {
00103     return 1/_yToBin;
00104   }
00105 
00106 
00107   //CRP 5/1/06 To satisfy redefinition of interface in LCIO
00108   UInt_t calice_id() {
00109     return (UInt_t) _obj->getIntVal(kHistogram2DId);
00110   }
00111 
00112   Double_t entries() const {
00113     return _obj->getDoubleVal(kHistogram2DEntries);
00114   };
00115 
00116   void addToEntries(Double_t weight)  {
00117     _obj->setDoubleVal(kHistogram2DEntries,entries()+weight);
00118   };
00119 
00120 
00121   // ---- need to implement LCGenericObject interface:
00122     
00123   int getNInt() const    { return kNHistogram2DInts ; };
00124   int getNFloat() const  { return _obj->getNFloat() ; };
00125   int getNDouble() const { return _obj->getNDouble(); }; 
00126     
00127   int getIntVal(int index) const {
00128     return _obj->getIntVal( index ) ;
00129   };
00130   float getFloatVal(int index) const { 
00131     return _obj->getFloatVal( index ) ;
00132   };
00133   double getDoubleVal(int index) const {
00134     return  _obj->getDoubleVal( index ) ;
00135   };
00136   bool isFixedSize() const { return false ; };
00137 
00138   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00139     return __typeName;
00140   }
00141 
00142   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00143     return __description;
00144   }
00145   
00146   // ---- end of LCGenericObject interface
00147 
00148 protected:
00149 
00150   void setBinning(const HistPar &x_bins, const HistPar &y_bins) {
00151     _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram2DXNBins,(Int_t) x_bins.nBins());
00152     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram2DXmin,x_bins.xMin());
00153     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram2DXmax,x_bins.xMax());
00154 
00155     _xToBin=x_bins.nBins() / (x_bins.xMax() - x_bins.xMin() );
00156 
00157     _obj->setIntVal(kHistogram2DYNBins,(Int_t) y_bins.nBins());
00158     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram2DYmin,y_bins.xMin());
00159     _obj->setFloatVal(kHistogram2DYmax,y_bins.xMax());
00160 
00161     _yToBin=y_bins.nBins() / (y_bins.xMax() - y_bins.xMin() );
00162   };
00163 
00164   void setXtoBins() {
00165     _xToBin=xNBins()/(xMax() - xMin()) ;
00166   }
00167   void setYtoBins() {
00168     _yToBin=yNBins()/(yMax() - yMin()) ;
00169   }
00170 
00171   UInt_t xBinIndex(Float_t value) const 
00172   {
00173     Double_t bin_f=(value-xMin())*_xToBin;
00174     if (bin_f<0.) {return xUnderflowBinIndex();};
00175     UInt_t bin_i=static_cast<unsigned int>(bin_f);
00176     if (bin_i>=xNBins()) {return xOverflowBinIndex();};
00177     
00178     return bin_i+xFirstBinIndex();
00179   };
00180 
00181   UInt_t yBinIndex(Float_t value) const 
00182   {
00183     Double_t bin_f=(value-yMin())*_yToBin;
00184     if (bin_f<0.) {return yUnderflowBinIndex();};
00185     UInt_t bin_i=static_cast<unsigned int>(bin_f);
00186     if (bin_i>=yNBins()) {return yOverflowBinIndex();};
00187     
00188     return bin_i+yFirstBinIndex();
00189   };
00190 
00191   UInt_t getContainerSize() const {
00192     return (xNBins()+2)*(yNBins()+2);
00193   }
00194 
00195   lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() {return _obj;};
00196   const lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* obj() const {return _obj;};
00197 
00198   lcio::LCGenericObjectImpl* _obj;
00199   bool _createdObject ;
00200   static const std::string __typeName;
00201   static const std::string __description;
00202 
00203   Double_t _xToBin;
00204   Double_t _yToBin;
00205 };
00206 
00207 }
